gunk
stderr '^usage: gunk \['
! stdout .

gunk help
stderr '^usage: gunk \['
! stdout .

gunk generate --help
stderr '^usage: gunk generate'
! stdout .

gunk help generate
stderr '^usage: gunk generate'
! stdout .

! gunk missing
stderr 'expected command'

! gunk generate --missing
stderr 'unknown long flag'
! stdout .
